meanings.definition: The branch of mathematics dealing with the relations of the sides and angles of triangles and with the relevant functions of any angles.
meanings.sent1: Trigonometry helps us understand the angles of triangles.
meanings.sent2: In trigonometry, we study the relationships between sides and angles.
meanings.sent3: I used trigonometry to figure out the height of the tree, but I ended up measuring my own height instead!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like trigonometry, calculating every possible outcome before making a decision.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made trigonometry come alive by using real-life examples with triangles and angles.
